docs.snippet: The six inductees to the Hall of Fame this year have an impressive collection of career highlights among them....
docs.lead_paragraph: The six inductees to the Hall of Fame this year have an impressive collection of career highlights among them.
docs.abstract: Career highlights of Greg Maddux, Tom Glavine, Frank Thomas, Bobby Cox, Tony La Russa and Joe Torre, six 2014 inductees to the Baseball Hall of Fame.

headline.seo: A Closer Look at the 2014 Hall of Fame Class
headline.main: An Assemblage of Accomplishments Across the Diamond
headline.print_headline: An Assemblage of Accomplishments Across the Diamond

docs.snippet: With Greg Maddux, Tom Glavine and Bobby Cox among the six living inductees, the Hall of Fame ceremony stood in lively contrast to last year’s sleepy proceedings....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Greg Maddux, Tom Glavine and Bobby Cox among the six living inductees, the Hall of Fame ceremony stood in lively contrast to last year’s sleepy proceedings.
docs.abstract: Hall of Fame induction ceremony of 2014 includes Joe Torre, Frank Thomas, Tony La Russa, as well as Atlanta Braves legends Bobby Cox, Greg Maddux and Tom Glavine; nearly 48,000 fans attend the ceremony at Clark Sports Center, which was empty in 2013 when three long-dead men were inducted.

headline.seo: Glavine and Maddux Lead a Hall of Fame Day Dominated by Braves
headline.main: Braves Rule Crowds on Cooperstown’s Podium and Lawn
headline.print_headline: Braves Rule Cooperstown’s Podium and Lawn

docs.snippet: Jacob deGrom was not at his best, but he allowed only one hit over the first five innings and dropped his E.R.A. over his last seven starts to 1.37....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jacob deGrom was not at his best, but he allowed only one hit over the first five innings and dropped his E.R.A. over his last seven starts to 1.37.
docs.abstract: New York Mets defeat Milwaukee Brewers, 2-0, as Mets pitcher Jacob deGrom improves his chances for NL Rookie of the Year award.

headline.main: DeGrom, a Key to the Mets’ Future, Is Taking Over the Present
headline.print_headline: DeGrom, a Key to the Future, Is Taking Over the Present

docs.snippet: The Yankees came back to tie the score at 2-2, 3-3 and 4-4, but in the ninth, they allowed Jose Bautista to steal second, and he soon scored the decisive run....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees came back to tie the score at 2-2, 3-3 and 4-4, but in the ninth, they allowed Jose Bautista to steal second, and he soon scored the decisive run.
docs.abstract: Toronto Blue Jays defeat New York Yankees, 5-4.

headline.main: Steal by Bautista Helps Blue Jays Overcome Three Yankees Rallies
headline.print_headline: Steal by Bautista Helps Blue Jays Overcome Three Yankees Rallies

docs.snippet: Manny Machado hit a bases-loaded sacrifice fly in the 10th inning, and the visiting Baltimore Orioles beat the Seattle Mariners, 3-2....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manny Machado hit a bases-loaded sacrifice fly in the 10th inning, and the visiting Baltimore Orioles beat the Seattle Mariners, 3-2.
docs.abstract: Baseball Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers complete three-game sweep of San Francisco Giants with 4-3 win; other MLB scores noted.

headline.main: Dodgers Complete a Sweep, Ruining Peavy’s Giants Debut
headline.print_headline: Dodgers Complete a Sweep, Ruining Peavy’s Giants Debut

docs.snippet: Contenders will be looking to shore up their hitting or their pitching as the nonwaiver trading period ends Thursday....

docs.snippet: Even as they fight sports betting, pro leagues are viewing websites that have whittled fantasy seasons down to a single day as potentially important to their future....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even as they fight sports betting, pro leagues are viewing websites that have whittled fantasy seasons down to a single day as potentially important to their future.
docs.abstract: Daily fantasy sports website DraftKings lets players put their skills, and cash, up against others’ while compressing the grind of a season into a single day; Major League Baseball especially has taken daily fantasy sports under its wing and formed partnership with DraftKings; baseball executives see daily fantasy sports as an increasingly important part of their future.

headline.seo: Pro Leagues Warm to Online Daily Fantasy Leagues
headline.main: Lost a Fantasy Game? Try Again Tomorrow
headline.print_headline: Lost a Fantasy Game? Try Again Tomorrow

docs.snippet: Dozens of friends assembled in Irvington, N.Y., on Saturday for a softball tournament organized to support a foundation dedicated to spreading awareness about obsessive-compulsive disorder....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of friends assembled in Irvington, N.Y., on Saturday for a softball tournament organized to support a foundation dedicated to spreading awareness about obsessive-compulsive disorder.
docs.abstract: Friends and supporters of the late John C Kelly assemble in Irvington, NY, for fourth annual softball tournament organized to raise money for the JCK Foundation in his name; foundation spreads awareness of obsessive-compulsive disorder, which led to Kelly's suicide in 2010 at the age of 24 after a lengthy battle with a severe form of OCD.

headline.main: Friends Take the Field to Call Attention to an Illness That Took a Life
headline.print_headline: Friends Take the Field to Call Attention to an Illness That Took a Life

docs.lead_paragraph: Supporters of Venezuela's late socialist leader Hugo Chavez on Monday unveiled yet another novel way of keeping his memory alive - a font for typing in "El Comandante's" handwriting style.
